page.title: 17A CAPERNWRAY FAMILY.
page.content: The Gates family-two adults, two boys aged 14 and 12 live in a small cluster of four dwellings developed from a redundant farmhouse and its adjacent barns. Keer Grange has been modernised completely changed-with oil fired central heating,a fully equipped kitchen etc and has plenty of space for children to play.The 0.75 acre garden is used primarily as a football /cricket pitch though it also produces some flowers,fruit and some vegetables .During the week,they are all engaged with full time education;the local High School and /Brian at St.Martin's College.However during the weekends and some evenings,the boys take advantage of the local swimming pool and tennis courts,the village hall for badminton and the canal for canoeing and as a family they are avid skiers.
